Nobody has beat my record at drumming yet! Nobody ever will, not without knowing about the secret power-up, fufufu~

Hello! Would you like to beat the fast drumming highscore?
Sure

do you want a totally legal pizza?
Uhh, "totally legal"?
well it's not forbidden, that's for sure. The thing is just that I lost the ingredients...
Umm... so no pizza?
Too bad, have a nice day.
No...
hey, I didn't mean it like that! I meant I just forgot the ingredients... at home, yes, at home!
I can't leave in case customers show up! Can you get some new ingredients for me instead?
Sure...
That doesn't make any sense!
that's not a no, so...

so the ingredients that are missing are:
- Pizza dough
- Pineapples
Pineapple on Pizza?!
it's delicious!
I mean if I get my pizza...
I'll even give you the pizza for free
So, I was pretty sure I had the [b]Pizza dough[/b] somewhere, but I can't seem to find it. It should still be somewhere around here.
For the [b]Pineapples[/b], some rude customer threw my Pineapples all the way over there onto these stone pillars. Since you got wings, can you maybe fly up there and grab them?
Thank you so much for the ingredients!
I'll make you a pizza right away...
*bzzzzt* [wait=2.0]*[do SFX.play_wav("res://sfx/pickup_coin.wav")]DING*
Here you go! Pizza with extra pineapple, for free, as promised.
I've got pizza again, but nobody wants any... More for me!
